title: BCIT Data Control List
description:
My team and I replaced the outdated MS Access system with a new custom database for policy management.

A new user interface offers a seamless and responsive experience, allowing efficient navigation and task completion.

Incorporated secure authentication, advanced search capabilities, and automated report generation to improve efficiency and reduce errors.
techStack: Next.js, PostgreSQL, Prisma, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript, Vercel, NextAuth, Amazon S3, pgAdmin,

title: Neural Net Numbers
description:
I created a basic neural network in C# designed to recognize handwritten digits from the MNIST dataset.

It includes functionalities such as training the network, saving/loading trained weights, and adjusting network parameters dynamically.
techStack: C#, MNIST dataset, .NET Framework, Visual Studio 2019

title: Wine Whisperer
description:
WineWhisperer is an AI powered wine recommendation app created by my team that aims to make finding your next favorite wine easy.

The app uses a machine learning model to predict the wine rating based on user input. There is also a focus on highlighting environmentally friendly wines.

Users can save and share their favorite wines, as well as view the environmental impact of their wine choices.
techStack: Next.js, Tailwind CSS, MaterialUI, TypeScript, JavaScript, NextAuth, MongoDB, OpenAI API, Vercel

title: Campus Connections
description:
This is a browser based web application that allows the users to create and join groups with others on the BCIT campus.

Some prominent features include: clicking on areas of the map to automatically sort through the list of current groups,

creating your own group with a specified title, group-type, location, time, description and number of participants,

customizing your profile name and image, and sending chats to people in your current group.

title: WaveCraft
description:
WaveCraft is an audio processing application designed for in-depth analysis and editing of wave files.

It allows users to open, create, save, and analyze wave files through graphical visualization, offering functionalities like header information viewing, and basic editing operations including cut, copy, and paste.

title: Scuffed Civ
description:
Scuffed Civ is a strategy game where players manage resources, build units, and compete against each other or AI on a dynamically generated map.

The game features a main menu with options to start a new game, continue a previous game, or play online. Players can choose game settings such as board size and the number of players. The game includes different units like workers and soldiers, each with specific abilities,

and ends when one player has no more units left.

title: Dynamic Sound
description:
Dynamic Sound is a small demo game that incorporates real-time audio manipulation within a visually environment.

It focuses on dynamic sound effects to enhance player interaction and game immersion. The application is built using C++ with extensive use of the Windows API for graphical rendering and event handling, alongside XAudio2 for advanced audio capabilities.
techStack: C, C++, Windows API, XAudio2, Direct2D, DirectWrite, Visual Studio 2019

title: My Portfolio
description:
This is my personal portfolio website that showcases my projects.

I wanted to tell you a bit about myself and present my projects in an easy and minimalist way. The website is fully responsive and was built to help me learn more about React and Next.js.
techStack: Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript, Vercel
